```{r, echo=TRUE, eval=TRUE}
library(readxl)
library(tidyr)
library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)
library(scales)

# Veriyi oku (uyarÄ±larÄ± bastÄ±r)
df <- suppressMessages(read_excel("C:/Users/aktas/OneDrive/yangin_verisi/orman_yanginlari1988_2023.xlsx"))

# SayÄ±sal kolonlarÄ± temizle + dÃ¶nÃ¼ÅŸtÃ¼r (uyarÄ±larÄ± bastÄ±r)
df$yil <- suppressWarnings(as.numeric(df$yil))
df$adet <- suppressWarnings(as.numeric(gsub("[^0-9.]", "", df$adet)))
df$hektar <- suppressWarnings(as.numeric(gsub("[^0-9.]", "", df$hektar)))

    scale_x_continuous(breaks = seq(min(df$yil), max(df$yil), by = 1)) +
    labs(title = "YÄ±llara GÃ¶re Orman YangÄ±n SayÄ±sÄ±",
         x = "YÄ±l", y = "YangÄ±n SayÄ±sÄ± (adet)") +
    theme_minimal() +
    theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 90, vjust = 0.5))
)

# Grafik 2: Yanan Alan (DÃœZENLENDÄ°: Y ekseni okunaklÄ±)
print(
  ggplot(df, aes(x = yil, y = hektar)) +
    geom_line(linewidth = 1.2, color = "darkgreen") +
    geom_point(color = "forestgreen") +
    scale_x_continuous(breaks = seq(min(df$yil), max(df$yil), by = 1)) +
    scale_y_continuous(labels = label_comma()) +
    labs(title = "YÄ±llara GÃ¶re Yanan Alan (Hektar)",

    scale_x_continuous(breaks = seq(min(neden_df$yil), max(neden_df$yil), by = 1)) +
    labs(title = "YangÄ±n Nedenlerine GÃ¶re YÄ±llÄ±k DaÄŸÄ±lÄ±m",
         x = "YÄ±l", y = "YangÄ±n SayÄ±sÄ±") +
    theme_minimal() +
    theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 90, vjust = 0.5))
)
```

```{r, echo=TRUE, eval=TRUE}
library(readr)
library(readxl)
library(dplyr)
library(leaflet)
library(stringi)

# TÃ¼rkÃ§e karakter dÃ¼zeltme fonksiyonu
duzelt <- function(x) {
  tolower(stri_trans_general(x, "Latin-ASCII"))
}

# 1. Ä°l koordinat verisini yÃ¼kle (il.csv dosyan)
koord <- read_csv("C:/Users/aktas/OneDrive/yangin_verisi/il.csv") |>
  mutate(il_adi = duzelt(il_adi)) |>
  select(sehir = il_adi, lat, lon)

# 2. 2023 yÄ±lÄ± yangÄ±n verisini oku ve temizle
iller <- read_excel("C:/Users/aktas/OneDrive/yangin_verisi/iller_2023.xlsx") |>
  filter(sehir != "TÃ¼rkiye") |>
  mutate(
    sehir = duzelt(sehir),
    adet = as.numeric(gsub(",", ".", adet)),
    hektar = as.numeric(gsub(",", ".", hektar))
  )

# 3. Koordinatlar ile yangÄ±n verisini birleÅŸtir

# 4. Leaflet haritasÄ± oluÅŸtur

    )
  )
```

### ğŸŒ Harita: 2023 â€“ Ä°l BazÄ±nda YangÄ±n BaÅŸÄ±na Ortalama Yanan Alan

Bu interaktif harita, TÃ¼rkiye'deki illerde 2023 yÄ±lÄ± boyunca Ã§Ä±kan yangÄ±nlar baÅŸÄ±na dÃ¼ÅŸen ortalama yanan alanÄ± (hektar / adet) gÃ¶stermektedir. BaloncuklarÄ±n bÃ¼yÃ¼klÃ¼ÄŸÃ¼, o ildeki yangÄ±nlarÄ±n ortalama ÅŸiddetini yansÄ±tmaktadÄ±r.


```{r, echo=TRUE, eval=TRUE}
library(readr)
library(readxl)
library(dplyr)
library(leaflet)
library(stringi)

# Karakter dÃ¼zeltme fonksiyonu
duzelt <- function(x) {
  tolower(stri_trans_general(x, "Latin-ASCII"))
}

# 1. Koordinat verisini oku
koord <- read_csv("C:/Users/aktas/OneDrive/yangin_verisi/il.csv") |>
  mutate(sehir = duzelt(il_adi)) |>
  select(sehir, lat, lon)

# 2. Ä°l yangÄ±n verisini oku ve ortalama hesapla
iller <- read_excel("C:/Users/aktas/OneDrive/yangin_verisi/iller_2023.xlsx") |>
  filter(sehir != "TÃ¼rkiye") |>
  mutate(
    sehir = duzelt(sehir),
    adet = as.numeric(gsub(",", ".", adet)),
    hektar = as.numeric(gsub(",", ".", hektar)),
    oran = hektar / adet
  ) |>
  filter(!is.na(oran), oran > 0)

# 3. BirleÅŸtir
veri <- left_join(koord, iller, by = "sehir") |> filter(!is.na(lat), !is.na(oran))

# 4. Renk paleti oluÅŸtur (kÄ±rmÄ±zÄ± tonlarÄ±)
pal <- colorNumeric(palette = "YlOrRd", domain = veri$oran)

# 5. HaritayÄ± Ã§iz
leaflet(veri) |>
  addProviderTiles("CartoDB.Positron") |>
  addCircleMarkers(
    lng = ~lon,
    lat = ~lat,
    radius = ~sqrt(oran)*2.5, # daha fark edilir hale gelir
    fillColor = ~pal(oran),
    fillOpacity = 0.8,
    color = "#444", weight = 1,
    stroke = TRUE,
    popup = ~paste0(
      "<b>", toupper(sehir), "</b><br>",
      "YangÄ±n SayÄ±sÄ±: ", adet, "<br>",
      "Yanan Alan: ", hektar, " ha<br>",
      "<b>ğŸ”¥ Ortalama Hektar / YangÄ±n:</b> ", round(oran, 2)
    )
  ) |>
  addLegend(
    pal = pal, values = ~oran,
    title = "Ortalama Hektar / YangÄ±n",
    position = "bottomright"
  )


```

Bu bÃ¶lÃ¼mde, geÃ§miÅŸ verilere dayalÄ± olarak 2024â€“2026 yÄ±llarÄ±na ait orman yangÄ±nÄ± sayÄ±sÄ± tahmini yapÄ±lmÄ±ÅŸtÄ±r. Tahminler, ARIMA (Auto-Regressive Integrated Moving Average) zaman serisi modeli ile elde edilmiÅŸtir.
